mapper.insert: insert into `employee`(employee_id, employee_name, sex, address, department, job_title, employment_status, hire_date, birth_date, empInsuranceNumber, pensionNumber, posionRank, resume) values(#{employee_id}, #{employee_name}, #{sex}, #{address}, #{department}, #{job_title}, #{employment_status}, #{hire_date}, #{birth_date}, #{empInsuranceNumber}, #{pensionNumber}, #{posionRank}, #{resume})
mapper.select:
select * from `employee`
AND employee_id = #{employee_id}
AND department LIKE concat('%',#{department},'%')
AND employee_name LIKE concat('%',#{employee_name},'%')
AND address LIKE concat('%',#{address},'%')
